review: the accessibility to programs and movies is fantastic however the sound does not come through my surround it only comes from the television speaker it kind of sucks to watch a movie and knowing it's an 5.1 surround and all I get is sound from the small speakers in my television. I have one online I've asked people I've contacted cable company to find out is there anyway I can get it to run through my surround and doesn't seem like that's possible so anyway it is what it is maybe the next generation f havI'll fire stick will have that  capability......
author: R.J.Vance

review: Great tool!  Allows us to use computer monitors for streaming.  Great for the kids playroom too - very portable.
author: TeeCee "TeeCee"

review: Took less than 5 minutes to install. "Fired" right up. Within 10 minutes, watching 1st movie. Love it!
author: Bob C

review: I love this! We have so many options for movies now. Really a quality product.
author: Rachel Mueller

review: Happy with this product , simple set up and simple to use..
author: bobby

review: A good product for me as a traveler. The one drawback is that it is hard to hook to hotel internet networks that require a web browser to sign in.
author: Author Don Massenzio "Don Massenzio"

review: I like being able to watch my amazon watch list anywhere in my house. Great product!
author: Alison Schriver

review: Makes watching Amazon's Prime Movie's so much easier.
author: Lighthouse "Thankful for miracles"
